title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1. Ultrasonic grating. 2. Faraday efect. 3. Kerr effect. 4. Zeeman effect. 5. Spark and arc spectrum of metals and alloys. 6. Iodine absorption spectrum. 7. Determination of wavelength of spectral lines of H, Ne, He sources. 8. Determining the wavelenghts of the Na D lines. 9.Measurement of laser beam parameters. 10. Measurement of photoelastic constant.
